name: KOKORO TETRIS
description:
Build cubes for your Unity-Chan! ✨
Kokoro tetris is a tetris-clone made in 2 days by three youthful students, desiring to bring to life a single vision: an otaku tetris game! 
It is super stupid, but we had so much fun :D
Unity-Chan's hair color change depending on what colors were the most dominant in the row!
Please play the Windows version for the full experience!

Controls:
Arrow keys to move and rotate the block
LeftShift to make the block fall down faster
P to activate Doge mode
